mapper.update:
update tb_project_timeline
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEETING_TIME = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEETING_DATE = #{meetingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMELINE_CONTENT = #{timelineContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMELINE_AUTHOR = #{timelineAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM4 = #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM5 = #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATETIME = now()
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_project_timeline set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEETING_TIME = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEETING_DATE = #{meetingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMELINE_CONTENT = #{timelineContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMELINE_AUTHOR = #{timelineAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM4 = #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM5 = #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = now() where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
